Alright let me just tell you I‚Äôm gonna write a review about spy mouse and why you should bring it back, telling IOS to update in a way that will bring back spy mouse, and also list what was better about spy mouse than this game. 

Spy mouse was honored best paid game for a long while. It launched in 2011 in the App Store and was a great game. Apple was just starting up their products back then, and there were very many glitches that could happen.

iOS was (and is now) what they call it when they updated all of their products. Many games have to update too when iOS comes along and updates apples products. Unfortunately, spy mouse thought that their game was fine on its own, so Apple had to force it out of the App Store, which made everyone want it back.

Now when people make cheap rip-offs to get spy mouse lovers to buy them and waste their money, people usually ask to bring back spy mouse. Most people don‚Äôt know why it had to be taken off iPad, which is why I wrote this review to tell everyone. Attention everyone, if you want spy mouse back, don‚Äôt ask the App Store, ask iOS! 

Now for the differences between this game and spy mouse

Spy mouse could just be dragged across and the line behind the mouse is the line that you would create so that the mouse would go where you wanted it to go, but in amazing escape, you have to swipe to get the mouse moving. This game also wants you to rate it five stars for characters, which is a huge rip off. This brings us back to where they know spy mouse was a great game, so rip offs should get people to download.

They know that some of their customers know its a rip off so they get people to give good ratings so that other people will download so that in turn they will get more money from ads. That brings us back to how huge of a rip off it is. All you get from all of that is characters! What a rip off.

Anyway, back to how their different. This game has glitches. Spy mouse had none. (I‚Äôm using past tense because it got sent away, not because it has glitches right now cause that isn‚Äôt true) spy mouse was more fun, you could go through cracks to unlock secret areas, find little brackets of stuff up ahead (even in a new world!) it was just way better. That‚Äôs all I have to say for that part, now cover your ears for the next part.

AMAZING ESCAPE IS NOT AMAZING. IT IS JUST A CHEAP RIP OFF NO ONE SHOULD BUY. EVERY ONE, CHEER, BRING BACK SPY MOUSE, THE BEST GAME IN THE WORLD. BRING BACK SPY MOUSE IOS YOU DIDN‚ÄôT HAVE TO UPDATE. BRING. BACK. SPY MOUSE!!!!!! CURSE YOU AMAZING ESCAPE, CURSE YOU. CURSE THOSE WHO WORK AT TOMATO FACTORY TRYING TO EARN A CHEAP BUCK OFF US SPY MOUSE LOVERS. IF SPY MOUSE WAS STILL HERE, YOUR GAME WOULD BE IN RUINS. JUST STOP RIPPING US OFF AND DELETE YOUR GAME FOREVER I HATE TOMATO FACTORY. 
 
time to talk to iOS

iOS I just want to ask one thing, can you bring back spy mouse? It was the best game ever, the best of the best, better than all of the rip offs. I swear, if spy mouse doesn‚Äôt, come back soon, I‚Äôll create a game like it, except that it will work with iOS. It will be great, and I hope that it won‚Äôt be deleted deleted like the first spy mouse.

Cheers to all spy mouse lovers, and lets hope for another real (not rip off) spy mouse!
